Leo Bohannan

  1. Foster Name: Leo
  2. Foster Family: John W. and Louise Riehl Whitney
  3. Location of Family: Fullerton, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Lincoln, NE
  6. Age on Arrival:
  7. Date of Birth: 1899-04-24
  8. Gender: female
  9. Married Name: George Palmer
  10. Source: OTR 135; Fullerton's First 100 Years (n.p.), p. 117-118
